languages.text: "Как изволите, Лорд-капитан. Если вкратце — дела паршиво. Судно, в общем-то, более-менее целое, вот только без Главного {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, которых в боях положили, путь из системы нам заказан. Если хоть на тютельку в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} сунуться попробуем, то не знаю, что раньше случится — наш собственный варп-двигатель корабль раскурочит или мы все с переборками сплавимся".

traits.locale_text: "Как изволите, Лорд-капитан. Если вкратце — дела паршиво. Головорезов мы, может, и порешали, но эти падлы жизнь нам попортили изрядно. Судно, в общем-то, более-менее целое, хоть и похоже на решето, но оно и не такое видало. Вот только без {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Старшего технопровидца{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, которых в боях положили, путь из системы нам заказан. Если хоть на тютельку в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} сунуться попробуем, то не знаю, что раньше случится — наш собственный варп-двигатель корабль раскурочит или мы все с переборками сплавимся. С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, проверять не буду".

languages.text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."
languages.original_text: "Как изволите, Лорд-капитан. Если вкратце — дела паршиво. Судно, в общем-то, более-менее целое, вот только без Главного {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, которых в боях положили, путь из системы нам заказан. Если хоть на тютельку в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} сунуться попробуем, то не знаю, что раньше случится — наш собственный варп-двигатель корабль раскурочит или мы все с переборками сплавимся".

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

"Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

"Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

"Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

languages.text: “没问题，船长老大。长话短说，前景不咋地。这艘船或多或少算是还能飞起来，但我们的主{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}都在战斗中死了。没有他们，咱们根本飞不出这个星系。如果打算在这种情况下强行冲进{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}，我恐怕说不好是咱们的亚空间引擎先被扯烂，还是咱们所有人先变成肉泥，糊在舱壁上。”
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

traits.locale_text: “没问题，船长老大。长话短说，前景不咋地。这艘船或多或少算是还能飞起来，但我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}首席引擎先知{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}都在战斗中死了。没有他们，我们根本飞不出这个星系。如果打算在这种情况下强行冲进{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}，我恐怕说不好是咱们的亚空间引擎先被扯烂，还是咱们所有人先变成肉泥，糊在舱壁上。”

languages.text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。手短に言えば…見通しは暗いものです。船は健在ですが、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}長と{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が戦死したため、出航できない状態にあります。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}に少しでも入ろうものなら、ワープドライブがバラバラになるか、我々全員が隔壁のなかへと溶けてしまうか、どちらかの末路をたどることになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。手短に言えば…見通しは暗いものです。船は健在ですが、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}長と{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が戦死したため、出航できない状態にあります。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}に少しでも入ろうものなら、ワープドライブがバラバラになるか、我々全員が隔壁のなかへと溶けてしまうか、どちらかの末路をたどることになるでしょう」

languages.text: "Jawohl, Lord Captain. Um es kurz zu machen – es sieht schlecht aus. Das Schiff ist mehr oder weniger in Ordnung, aber ohne unseren {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher Primus{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, die im Kampf gefallen sind, können wir das System nicht verlassen. Wenn wir auch nur einen Fuß in den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} setzen, weiß ich nicht, was zuerst passiert: dass es unseren Warpantrieb zerreißt oder dass wir alle mit den Schotten verschmelzen."
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

traits.locale_text: "Jawohl, Lord Captain. Um es kurz zu machen – es sieht schlecht aus. Das Schiff ist mehr oder weniger in Ordnung, aber ohne unseren {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}obersten Maschinenseher{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, die im Kampf gefallen sind, können wir das System nicht verlassen. Wenn wir auch nur einen Fuß in den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} setzen, weiß ich nicht, was zuerst passiert: dass es unseren Warpantrieb zerreißt oder dass wir alle mit den Schotten verschmelzen."

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Pour faire court, les perspectives sont pas bonnes. Le navire est plus ou moins en bon état, mais sans notre {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure primus{/g} et notre {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, tous deux morts au combat, on n'a aucun moyen de quitter ce système. Si on pose ne serait-ce qu'un orteil dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, le moteur volera en éclats ou on sera tous réduits à l'état de pulpe sanguinolente... vous pouvez en être {mf|certain|certaine} ! »
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Pour faire court, les perspectives sont pas bonnes. Le navire est plus ou moins en bon état, mais sans notre {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure en chef{/g} et notre {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, tous deux morts au combat, on n'a aucun moyen de quitter ce système. Si on pose ne serait-ce qu'un orteil dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, le moteur volera en éclats où on sera tous réduits à l'état de pulpe sanguinolente... vous pouvez en être {mf|certain|certaine} ! »

languages.text: «A la orden, Lord Capitán. En resumen, la cosa pinta mal. La nave está más o menos bien, pero, sin {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero primero{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g} después de la batalla, no tenemos forma de salir del sistema. Como intentemos meter aunque sea un dedo en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, pueden pasar dos cosas: o el motor de disformidad explota o todos nos derretimos y nos fusionamos con las mamparas».
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

traits.locale_text: «Toda la razón, Lord Capi. En resumen, la cosa pinta mal. La nave está más o menos bien, pero, sin {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero jefe{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g} después de la batalla, no tenemos forma de salir del sistema. Como intentemos meter aunque sea un dedo en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, pueden pasar dos cosas: o el motor de disformidad explota o todos nos derretimos y nos fusionamos con las mamparas».

languages.text: "Emriniz olur Lord Kaptan! Uzun lafın kısası, vaziyet iç açıcı değil. Gemi az buçuk sağlam ama muharebede şehit düşen {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyum{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacımız{/g} olmadan sistemden çıkamayız. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyuta{/g} parmağımızı bile sokmaya kalkarsak önce öteboyut motoru mu parçalanır yoksa biz mi bölme panelleriyle kaynaşırız bilemem."
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Lord Cap'n. To cut a long story short — the outlook is bleak. The ship's sound, more or less, but without our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime and {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, who fell in battle, we have no way out of the system. If we try to set so much as a toe inside the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I don't know what'll happen first, our warp drive being torn to pieces or all of us melting into the bulkheads."

traits.locale_text: "Emriniz olur Lord Kaptan! Uzun lafın kısası, vaziyet iç açıcı değil. Gemi az buçuk sağlam ama muharebede şehit düşen {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyum{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'mız olmadan sistemden çıkamayız. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g}a parmağımızı bile sokmaya kalkarsak önce öteboyut motoru mu parçalanır yoksa biz mi bölme panelleriyle kaynaşırız bilemem."
